(root).module_summary: An automated retail system that manages vending machine operations including product inventory, secure payment processing, transaction workflows (purchase, cancellation, fund addition), and expiry rule enforcement to ensure financial accuracy and operational integrity.
responsibilities: Manage product inventory
Process secure payments
Handle transaction workflows (purchase, cancellation, fund addition)
Enforce product expiry rules
Ensure financial precision in self-service retail operations

inventory.module_summary: The inventory module implements a core inventory management system for an automated retail vending machine, responsible for tracking, storing, retrieving, and removing expired products to maintain accurate and sellable stock.
responsibilities: Track product quantities and locations in the vending machine
Store inventory data reliably
Retrieve products upon purchase requests
Identify and remove expired items to ensure sellable stock integrity
Maintain financial accuracy by aligning inventory with sales

models.module_summary: The models module contains the core product entity (Item) for an automated retail system, responsible for managing vendable items with integrity checks for inventory and expiry.
responsibilities: Define the core Product (Item) entity
Enforce stock availability checks before sales
Validate product expiry conditions
Safely reduce item quantities during transactions

payment.module_summary: The payment module implements a comprehensive payment processing system for automated retail environments like vending machines, managing the full lifecycle of transactions including initiation, validation, completion, and reversal, while ensuring financial and inventory alignment.
responsibilities: Manage full transaction lifecycle (initiation, validation, completion, reversal)
Track transaction states using TxStatus and Tx classes
Handle various payment methods (e.g., Cash)
Ensure data integrity and secure cash handling
Reconcile financial records with inventory status
Process and reverse transactions and product additions
